text: Um , I'm just gonna go through the interface concept with yous now .

speaker: UI
text: Uh , first of all I'll explain what a user interface is .

speaker: UI
text: It's the aspects of a computer system which can be seen or otherwise perceived , for example , heard or felt maybe , or <vocalsound> by the human user .

speaker: UI
text: And it's also the commands that the user uses to control its operation and to input data .

speaker: UI
text: Um , there are two types of user interfaces .

speaker: UI
text: There's the graphical user interface , which emphasises the use of pictures for output

speaker: UI
text: and a pointing device , for example a mouse for input control .

speaker: UI
text: So that's sort of like the scroll thing we were talking about .

speaker: UI
text: I'm not really sure about the pictures that <disfmarker>

speaker: UI
text: maybe that's on an L_C_D_ screen .

speaker: UI
text: the the buttons or pictures or something . <vocalsound>
